attributes.action: To force Postcomm, to allow Royal Mail a level playing field.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What seems to be happening is that Royal Mail is being given the 'donkey work' whilst rivals continue to chew their way into Royal Mail's only really profitable work - business mail.

Royal Mail is being told that it must do all the delivery work and watch it's profits go to rivals - until Postcomm decides otherwise.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
